Package au.csiro.pathling.security.ga4gh

Class ScopeAwareDatabase

java.lang.Object
au.csiro.pathling.io.Database
au.csiro.pathling.io.CacheableDatabase
au.csiro.pathling.security.ga4gh.ScopeAwareDatabase
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cacheable, au.csiro.pathling.io.source.DataSource
@Component @Profile("core & ga4gh") public class ScopeAwareDatabase extends CacheableDatabase
A special type of Database that is capable of limiting the scope of resources based upon the passport scopes that have been applied to this request.
Author:
John Grimes

  • Constructor Details

    • ScopeAwareDatabase

      public ScopeAwareDatabase(@Nonnull ServerConfiguration configuration, @Nonnull FhirContext fhirContext, @Nonnull SparkSession spark, @Nonnull au.csiro.pathling.encoders.FhirEncoders fhirEncoders, @Nonnull Optional<TerminologyServiceFactory> terminologyServiceFactory, @Nonnull Optional<PassportScope> passportScope, @Nonnull org.springframework.scheduling.concurrent.ThreadPoolTaskExecutor executor)
      Parameters:
      configuration - a ServerConfiguration object to control the behaviour of the executor
      fhirContext - a FhirContext for doing FHIR stuff
      spark - a SparkSession for interacting with Spark
      fhirEncoders - FhirEncoders object for creating empty datasets
      terminologyServiceFactory - a TerminologyServiceFactory for resolving terminology queries
      passportScope - a PassportScope that can be used to limit the scope of resources,
      executor - a ThreadPoolTaskExecutor for executing background tasks
